definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)

sentences.english: But, Gao's refutation also had some unreasonableness .
sentences.chinese: 不过，他对王学的批驳也有不合理之处。

sentences.english: Her article brilliantly demolishes his argument.
sentences.chinese: 她的文章精辟地批驳了他的论点。

sentences.english: Having refuted the Wise Old Man's wrong ideas, the Foolish Old Man went on digging.
sentences.chinese: 愚公批驳了智叟的错误思想之后，就继续挖山。

sentences.english: Airplanes don't comment on your piloting skills.
sentences.chinese: 飞机不会批驳你的驾驶技能。

sentences.english: Yet in fact, computer collapse the distances and demolishes all boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 但事实上，电脑崩溃距离和批驳了界限。

sentences.english: The ambassador rejected Iran’s justifications for the two facilities.
sentences.chinese: 舒尔特大使批驳了伊朗为这两处设施提出的理由。

sentences.english: Herr article brilliantly demolishes his argument.
sentences.chinese: 她的文章精辟地批驳了他的论点。

sentences.english: It's not difficult to tear down a groundless argument.
sentences.chinese: 批驳一个没有根据的论点并不难。

sentences.english: Third, popular at that time to refute the wrong views.
sentences.chinese: 三是对当时流行的错误观点进行批驳。

definition: to criticize harshly/to denounce/to attack viciously
strange tales and absurd arguments (idiom)/unreasonable remarks
to attack sb by exposing faults/to denounce
lit. to quote the classics/to quote chapter and verse (idiom)
to vilify sb wantonly/unrestrained attack (on sb)
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
